parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if freelook is active.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''freeLook'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[systemChat]] (if [[freeLook]] [[then]] {"Quit looking around player!"} [[else]] {""});
</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[lookAt]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>Will check the player of the machine where the command is used.
</value></part></template></root>
